page.title: 13ADLINGTON HOUSING ESTATE
page.content: This is a fairly small estate consisting of four roads bordering Brookledge Lane.All of the properties are detached with large mature gardens. Redbrook Way gets its name from the small stream which it crosses halfway along its length.It contains 12 houses and 1 bungalow and an electric substation.Legh Road contains 13 houses and 11 bungalows.Broughton Road has 9 houses and 5 bungalows.Wych Lane has a new property being built at present.It is a large detached house on the corner of Wych Lane and Brookledge Lane.A pond has been drained and trees removed to accommodate it.A gas supply has been installed in the area during the last year.Many people living on the estate are elderly and there are relatively few children.
